metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing MermaidOne of Flaming Fists - NOTE Please rename to Fist Virry.

0.speaker: Fist Virry
0.text: I'm going to miss our big metal buddy. Never had an easier time of shaking down the locals than when we had a Watcher at our back.

1.speaker: Fist Virry
1.text: These sad little citizens actually think we'll let them off the hook if they complain loudly enough. Ha! What dopes.

2.speaker: Fist Virry
2.text: These idiot townies just don't get it. When a leader like Gortash gets snuffed, you got to tighten down the screws. It's expected, like.
